title: Dynamics of Rotational Motion: Rotational Inertia
body: Zorch, an archenemy of Superman, decides to slow Earth’s rotation to once per $$28.0$$ $$h$$ by exerting an opposing force at and parallel to the equator. Superman is not immediately concerned, because he knows Zorch can only exert a force of $$4.00$$ * $${10}^7$$ N (a little greater than a Saturn V rocket’s thrust).
